meanings.definition: The quality or state of being beyond criticism or blame.
meanings.sent1: Her irreproachableness in handling the project earned her the admiration of her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: His irreproachableness in following the rules made him a trustworthy employee.
meanings.sent3: The cat's irreproachableness in catching mice was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The old tree's irreproachableness in standing tall symbolized resilience and strength.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's irreproachableness in explaining complex concepts made learning enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The act of being free from fault or blame.
meanings.sent1: The irreproachableness of his actions during the crisis was commendable.
meanings.sent2: She maintained her irreproachableness even in challenging situations.
meanings.sent3: The irreproachableness of the clown's performance left the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The irreproachableness of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.
meanings.sent5: The irreproachableness of the athlete's performance left the spectators in awe.
